message.content:
cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.NA, cs.SI, cs.SP. 

The paper deals with the problem of sparse signal recovery via $l_p$ minimization, which is a common topic in the fields of information theory (cs.IT), machine learning (cs.LG), numerical analysis (cs.NA), signal processing (cs.SP), and statistics (cs.SI). The paper presents new results that extend previous work on noiseless recovery to the case of noisy recovery, which is relevant to all of these sub-categories. Therefore, it is likely that this paper could be classified under any of these sub-categories, with cs.IT and cs.LG being the most likely due to the focus on sparse signal recovery.
